name: Laika (itch) (KennaJana)
description:
Laika goes to the moon to replace the United States flag with the USSR flag, while avoiding aliens and craters.

Controls:

A - move left

B - move right

space - jump

fire - shoot

Credits:

Coding and audio: Tatu Katajisto

Graphics: S. Hietaoja

Marketing and production: KennaJana

Our Twitter:
